alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jefferson; Shelby; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 7:34AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tuscaloosa, southwestern Shelby, northeastern Bibb and south central Jefferson Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 734 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brookwood, or near Holt, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Pelham, Helena, Montevallo, Lake View, Brookwood, Coaling, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, Wilton, Tannehill Ironworks State Park, Abernant, American Village, Maylene, Ashby, Lake Wildwood, Brierfield Ironworks Park, University Of Montevallo and Mercedes Benz Of Alabama. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
